r.s: Sundown is a fast, robust Markdown parsing library for PHP5
r.d:
Sundown is a fast, robust Markdown parsing library, originally created by Natacha Port√© and improved Vicent Marti. this extension inspired Redcarpet ruby extension which created by Vicent.
PECL Sundown provides straight forward object oriented Markdown API and customizable Renders.
r.n:
* bumped up 0.3.7
fixed SEGV when processing tableCell and prettify source codes.
9582b04 update contributors 1f11ace update README 497d0a4 add a space after comma. 7bc4703 fix several compile warnings a11eb98 update CFLAGS for fix compile warnings 9a86d00 fixes #26:prevent SEGV when calling Sundwon\Base\tableCell 26b77d6 change submodule to vmg/sundown from tanoku/sundown ee8a132 Merge pull request #24 from reeze/patch-2 0a08969 Fix build in php-src b0adcc7 Merge pull request #23 from reeze/patch-1 ebae34b Make travis report test failure since make test didn't report exit code
